Uses of Interface
menu.IMenuStrategy

  • Packages that use IMenuStrategy 
    Package Description
    menu  

    • Uses of IMenuStrategy in menu

      Classes in menu that implement IMenuStrategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Menu1ClientCourse
      The first menu branch where customer must enter their name If they're already in the clients list it's checked whether they have a ticket etc They're offered to order a ticket, or pay for it, or save the ticket to a file
      class  MenuClientNewClient
      A menu branch where the list of available flights is displayed; The client can choose one and order a ticket for it
      class  MenuClientOrderFlight
      A menu branch where the client can order a ticket for the flight they chose earlier
      class  MenuClientPay
      A menu branch where the client can pay for their ticket
      class  MenuClientSaveDecision
      A menu branch where the client can choose to save their ticket to a file
      class  MenuClientSaveTicket
      A menu branch where the client's ticket is saved to a file
